src/newtonERP/sourceCodeBuilder/EntitySourceCodeBuilder.java

00001 package newtonERP.sourceCodeBuilder;
00002 
00003 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.AccessorEntity;
00004 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.EntityEntity;
00005 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.FieldEntity;
00006 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.FieldTypeEntity;
00007 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.ModuleEntity;
00008 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00009 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00010 import newtonERP.orm.associations.PluralAccessor;
00011 
00016 public class EntitySourceCodeBuilder
00017 {
00022         public static String build(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00023         {
00024                 entityEntity = (EntityEntity) Orm.selectUnique(entityEntity);
00025 
00026                 String sourceCode = "";
00027 
00028                 sourceCode += "package modules." + getPackageName(entityEntity)
00029                                 + ".entityDefinitions;\n";
00030                 sourceCode += "\n";
00031                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.orm.field.*;\n";
00032                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.orm.field.type.*;";
00033                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.orm.associations.AccessorManager;\n";
00034                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;\n";
00035                 sourceCode += "import java.util.Hashtable;\n";
00036                 sourceCode += "import java.util.Vector;\n";
00037 
00038                 sourceCode += "\n";
00039                 sourceCode += "/**\n";
00040                 sourceCode += " * " + getVisibleName(entityEntity) + "\n";
00041                 sourceCode += " * @author NewtonERP code generator - Guillaume Lacasse\n";
00042                 sourceCode += " */\n";
00043                 sourceCode += "public class " + getSystemName(entityEntity)
00044                                 + " extends AbstractOrmEntity\n";
00045                 sourceCode += "{\n";
00046                 sourceCode += "    /**\n";
00047                 sourceCode += "     * constructor\n";
00048                 sourceCode += "     */\n";
00049                 sourceCode += "    public " + getSystemName(entityEntity) + "()\n";
00050                 sourceCode += "    {\n";
00051                 sourceCode += "        super();\n";
00052                 sourceCode += "        setVisibleName(\""
00053                                 + getVisibleName(entityEntity) + "\");\n";
00054 
00055                 sourceCode += getAccessorListCode(entityEntity);
00056 
00057                 sourceCode += "    }\n";
00058                 sourceCode += "\n";
00059                 sourceCode += "    public Fields initFields()\n";
00060                 sourceCode += "    {\n";
00061 
00062                 sourceCode += "        Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();\n";
00063                 sourceCode += getFieldsCode(entityEntity);
00064                 sourceCode += "        return new Fields(fieldList);\n";
00065                 sourceCode += "    }\n";
00066                 sourceCode += "}\n";
00067 
00068                 return sourceCode;
00069         }
00070 
00071         private static String getAccessorListCode(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00072 
00073         {
00074                 String sourceCode = "";
00075 
00076                 PluralAccessor accessorList = entityEntity
00077                                 .getPluralAccessor("AccessorEntity");
00078 
00079                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : accessorList)
00080                 {
00081                         AccessorEntity accessorEntity = (AccessorEntity) entity;
00082                         sourceCode += "        AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new "
00083                                         + getForeignEntityName(accessorEntity) + "());\n";
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 return sourceCode;
00087         }
00088 
00089         private static String getForeignEntityName(AccessorEntity accessorEntity)
00090         {
00091                 return accessorEntity.getDataString("foreignEntityName");
00092         }
00093 
00094         private static String getFieldsCode(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00095 
00096         {
00097                 String sourceCode = "";
00098                 for (FieldEntity fieldEntity : entityEntity)
00099                         sourceCode += getFieldCode(fieldEntity, entityEntity);
00100                 return sourceCode;
00101         }
00102 
00103         private static String getFieldCode(FieldEntity fieldEntity,
00104                         EntityEntity entityEntity)
00105         {
00106                 String sourceCode = "";
00107                 String quotedShortName = getSystemName(fieldEntity);
00108                 if (quotedShortName.equals(getPrimaryKeyName(entityEntity)))
00109                         quotedShortName = "getPrimaryKeyName()";
00110                 else
00111                         quotedShortName = "\"" + quotedShortName + "\"";
00112 
00113                 String camelCaseName = getCamelCaseName(fieldEntity);
00114 
00115                 sourceCode += "\n";
00116                 sourceCode += "        " + getFieldType(fieldEntity) + " "
00117                                 + camelCaseName + " = new " + getFieldType(fieldEntity) + "(\""
00118                                 + getVisibleName(fieldEntity) + "\", " + quotedShortName
00119                                 + ");\n";
00120 
00121                 if (isNaturalKey(fieldEntity))
00122                         sourceCode += "        " + camelCaseName
00123                                         + ".setNaturalKey(true);\n";
00124                 if (isHidden(fieldEntity))
00125                         sourceCode += "        " + camelCaseName + ".setHidden(true);\n";
00126                 if (isReadOnly(fieldEntity))
00127                         sourceCode += "        " + camelCaseName + ".setReadOnly(true);\n";
00128                 if (isDynamicField(fieldEntity))
00129                         sourceCode += "        " + camelCaseName
00130                                         + ".setDynamicField(true);\n";
00131 
00132                 sourceCode += "        fieldList.add(" + camelCaseName + ");\n";
00133 
00134                 return sourceCode;
00135         }
00136 
00137         private static String getCamelCaseName(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00138         {
00139                 String name = getSystemName(fieldEntity);
00140                 name = name.substring(0, 1).toLowerCase() + name.substring(1);
00141                 return name;
00142         }
00143 
00144         private static String getPrimaryKeyName(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00145         {
00146                 String name = getSystemName(entityEntity);
00147                 name = name.substring(0, 1).toLowerCase() + name.substring(1);
00148                 return "PK" + name + "ID";
00149         }
00150 
00151         private static boolean isDynamicField(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00152         {
00153                 return (Boolean) fieldEntity.getData("dynamicField");
00154         }
00155 
00156         private static boolean isHidden(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00157         {
00158                 return (Boolean) fieldEntity.getData("hidden");
00159         }
00160 
00161         private static boolean isReadOnly(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00162         {
00163                 return (Boolean) fieldEntity.getData("readOnly");
00164         }
00165 
00166         private static boolean isNaturalKey(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00167         {
00168                 return (Boolean) fieldEntity.getData("naturalKey");
00169         }
00170 
00171         private static String getVisibleName(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00172         {
00173                 return fieldEntity.getDataString("visibleName");
00174         }
00175 
00176         private static String getFieldType(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00177 
00178         {
00179                 FieldTypeEntity fieldType = (FieldTypeEntity) fieldEntity
00180                                 .getSingleAccessor(new FieldTypeEntity().getForeignKeyName());
00181 
00182                 return fieldType.getDataString("systemName");
00183         }
00184 
00185         private static String getSystemName(FieldEntity fieldEntity)
00186         {
00187                 return fieldEntity.getDataString("name");
00188         }
00189 
00190         private static String getSystemName(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00191         {
00192                 return entityEntity.getDataString("systemName");
00193         }
00194 
00195         private static String getVisibleName(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00196         {
00197                 return entityEntity.getDataString("visibleName");
00198         }
00199 
00200         private static String getPackageName(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00201 
00202         {
00203                 return ModuleSourceCodeBuilder
00204                                 .getPackageName(getModuleEntity(entityEntity));
00205         }
00206 
00207         private static ModuleEntity getModuleEntity(EntityEntity entityEntity)
00208 
00209         {
00210                 return (ModuleEntity) entityEntity.getSingleAccessor(new ModuleEntity()
00211                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00212         }
00213 
00214 }
